interactions.title: Цель уничтожена
interactions.trigger_condition: BPLA_VT40_1.properties['state'] == 'moving'  and  BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'] != '' and BPLA_VT40_1.actions.check_destroyed(objects=self.objects,  attacker=BPLA_VT40_1, target=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], min_distance=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['distance_of_defeat'], probability=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['probability'], time_in_seconds=self.second_in_iteration)

interactions.id: БПЛА камикадзе - Цель обнаружена, расчет точки встречи и вычисление маршрута
interactions.response_action: Model_00.actions.fox_rabbit(lat1=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['lat'], lon1=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['lon'], alt1=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['alt'], speed1=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['speed'], lat2=Model_00.actions.get_object_prop(item=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], prop='lat', objects=self.objects), lon2=Model_00.actions.get_object_prop(item=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], prop='lon', objects=self.objects), alt2=Model_00.actions.get_object_prop(item=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], prop='alt', objects=self.objects), speed2=Model_00.actions.get_object_prop(item=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], prop='speed', objects=self.objects), course2=Model_00.actions.get_object_prop(item=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], prop='course', objects=self.objects), dt=100.0) and BPLA_VT40_1.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BPLA_VT40_1.actions.find_path(ship_lat=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['lat'], ship_lon=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['lon'], target_lat=Model_00.properties['lat'], target_lon=Model_00.properties['lon'], geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="RESTRICTED_AREA"))
interactions.response_set_values: BPLA_VT40_1.properties['state'] = 'moving'; BPLA_VT40_1.properties['segment_index'] = 0; BPLA_VT40_1.properties['speed'] = BPLA_VT40_1.properties['attack_speed']; BPLA_VT40_1.properties['trigger_time'] = self.iteration_time + 10;
interactions.title: Цель обнаружена, расчет точки встречи и вычисление маршрута
interactions.trigger_condition: BPLA_VT40_1.properties['state'] in ['moving', 'standing'] and BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'] != '' and self.iteration_time > BPLA_VT40_1.properties['trigger_time'] and BPLA_VT40_1.actions.detect_enemy(item1=BPLA_VT40_1, objects=self.objects, rain=WEATHER.properties['rain_intensive'], frog=WEATHER.properties['frog_intensive'], max_distance=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['detection_distance'])

interactions.id: БПЛА камикадзе - Цель обнаружена, расчет точки встречи и вычисление маршрута

interactions.trigger_condition: len(BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates']) > 0 and BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['state'] in ['moving', 'attacking'] and WEATHER.properties['storm_state'] <= BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['max_excitement']

interactions.title: Прибытие в РОЖ
interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['state'] in ['finished'] and BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['target'] == '' and Model_00.actions.object_in_rog(item=BEK_MIKOLA_5, geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="WAITING_REGION")) != ''

interactions.response_action: Model_00.actions.fox_rabbit(lat1=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['lat'], lon1=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['lon'], alt1=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['alt'], speed1=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['attack_speed'], lat2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'], lon2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon'], alt2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['alt'], speed2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['speed'], course2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['course'], dt=100.0) and BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BEK_MIKOLA_5.actions.find_path(ship_lat=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['lat'], ship_lon=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['lon'], target_lat=Model_00.properties['lat'], target_lon=Model_00.properties['lon'], geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="RESTRICTED_AREA"));
interactions.title: Цель обнаружена, корректировка точки встречи, попытка расчета маршрута
interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['state'] in ['finished', 'attacking'] and BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['target'] != '' and self.iteration_time > BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['trigger_time']  and BEK_MIKOLA_5.actions.look_detection(item1=BEK_MIKOLA_5, item2=SHIP_ROGOV_1,  rain=WEATHER.properties['rain_intensive'], frog=WEATHER.properties['frog_intensive'], max_distance=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['detection_distance'])

interactions.response_action: Model_00.actions.fox_rabbit(lat1=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['lat'], lon1=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['lon'], alt1=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['alt'], speed1=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['attack_speed'], lat2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'], lon2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon'], alt2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['alt'], speed2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['speed'], course2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['course'], dt=100.0) and BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BEK_MIKOLA_5.actions.find_path(ship_lat=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['lat'], ship_lon=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['lon'], target_lat=Model_00.properties['lat'], target_lon=Model_00.properties['lon'], geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="RESTRICTED_AREA"))
interactions.title: Цель обнаружена, расчет точки встречи, вычисление маршрута
interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['state'] in ['waiting', 'standing'] and self.iteration_time >=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['waiting_time'] and BEK_MIKOLA_5.actions.look_detection(item1=BEK_MIKOLA_5, item2=SHIP_ROGOV_1,  rain=WEATHER.properties['rain_intensive'], frog=WEATHER.properties['frog_intensive'], max_distance=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['detection_distance'])

interactions.title: Цель уничтожена
interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['state'] == 'attacking'  and  BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['target'] != '' and BEK_MIKOLA_5.actions.check_destroyed(objects=self.objects,  attacker=BEK_MIKOLA_5, target=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['target'], min_distance=5, probability=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['probability'], time_in_seconds=self.second_in_iteration) and SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['state'] in ['destroyed']

interactions.response_set_values: BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['trigger_time'] = self.iteration_time + 10; BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['state'] = 'attacking'; BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['target'] = 'SHIP_ROGOV_1'; BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['segment_index'] = 0; BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['speed'] = BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['attack_speed'];BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BEK_MIKOLA_5.actions.get_variable_path(coordinates=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates']);
interactions.title: Построение маршрута с переменным курсом
interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['state'] in ['finished', 'attacking'] and BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['target'] != '' and self.iteration_time > BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['trigger_time']  and BEK_MIKOLA_5.actions.look_detection(item1=BEK_MIKOLA_5, item2=SHIP_ROGOV_1,  rain=WEATHER.properties['rain_intensive'], frog=WEATHER.properties['frog_intensive'], max_distance=BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['detection_distance'])

interactions.title: Движение по маршруту
interactions.trigger_condition: len(BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates']) > 0 and BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['state'] in ['moving', 'attacking'] and WEATHER.properties['storm_state'] <= BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['max_excitement']
